summary:
Panama is a country in Central America, connecting North and South America. It gained independence from Spain in 1821 and later became part of Colombia. With support from the U.S., Panama separated from Colombia in 1903 to build the famous Panama Canal. The canal, expanded in 2016, is a vital part of Panama's economy, along with commerce and tourism.

Panama is home to a diverse range of plants and animals in its vast jungles. It is a member of many international organizations, including the United Nations. With a high-income economy and a high Human Development Index, Panama is a significant country in Latin America.
title: Panama
